amendment.description: To clarify the availability and use of funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3791 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3791 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S3848; text: CR S3848) To clarify the availability and use of funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3791 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3791 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hutchison.
